verses.verse: I<WG1473> therefore<WG3767>, the prisoner<WG1198> of<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>, beseech<WG3870> you<WG5209> that ye walk<WG4043> worthy<WG516> of the vocation<WG2821> wherewith<WG3739> ye are called<WG2564>,
With<WG3326> all<WG3956> lowliness<WG5012> and<WG2532> meekness<WG4236>, with<WG3326> longsuffering<WG3115>, forbearing<WG430> one another<WG240> in<WG1722> love<WG26>;
Endeavouring<WG4704> to keep<WG5083> the unity<WG1775> of the Spirit<WG4151> in<WG1722> the bond<WG4886> of peace<WG1515>.
There is one<WG1520> body<WG4983>, and<WG2532> one<WG1520> Spirit<WG4151>, even as<WG2531><WG2532> ye are called<WG2564> in<WG1722> one<WG3391> hope<WG1680> of your<WG5216> calling<WG2821>;
One<WG1520> Lord<WG2962>, one<WG1520> faith<WG4102>, one<WG3391> baptism<WG908>,
One<WG1520> God<WG2316> and<WG2532> Father<WG3962> of all<WG3956>, who<WG3588> is above<WG1909> all<WG3956>, and<WG2532> through<WG1223> all<WG3956>, and<WG2532> in<WG1722> you<WG5213> all<WG3956>.
But<WG1161> unto every<WG1538> one<WG1520> of us<WG2257> is given<WG1325> grace<WG5485> according to<WG2596> the measure<WG3358> of the gift<WG1431> of Christ<WG5547>.
Wherefore<WG1352> he saith<WG3004>, When he ascended<WG305> up<WG1519> on high<WG5311>, he led captivity<WG162> captive<WG161>, and<WG2532> gave<WG1325> gifts<WG1390> unto men<WG444>.

(Now<WG1161> that he ascended<WG305>, what<WG5101> is it<WG2076> but<WG1508> that<WG3754> he<WG2597> also<WG2532> descended<WG2597> first<WG4412> into<WG1519> the lower<WG2737> parts<WG3313> of the earth<WG1093>?
He<WG846> that descended<WG2597> is<WG2076> the same also<WG2532> that ascended up<WG305> far above<WG5231> all<WG3956> heavens<WG3772>, that<WG2443> he might fill<WG4137> all things<WG3956>.)

And<WG2532> he<WG846> gave<WG1325> some<WG3303>, apostles<WG652>; and<WG1161> some, prophets<WG4396>; and<WG1161> some, evangelists<WG2099>; and<WG1161> some, pastors<WG4166> and<WG2532> teachers<WG1320>;
For<WG4314> the perfecting<WG2677> of the saints<WG40>, for<WG1519> the work<WG2041> of the ministry<WG1248>, for<WG1519> the edifying<WG3619> of the body<WG4983> of Christ<WG5547>:

Till<WG3360> we all<WG3956> come<WG2658> in<WG1519> the unity<WG1775> of the faith<WG4102>, and<WG2532> of the knowledge<WG1922> of the Son<WG5207> of God<WG2316>, unto<WG1519> a perfect<WG5046> man<WG435>, unto<WG1519> the measure<WG3358> of the stature<WG2244> of the fulness<WG4138> of Christ<WG5547>:

That<WG2443> we henceforth be<WG5600> no more<WG3371> children<WG3516>, tossed to and fro<WG2831>, and<WG2532> carried about with<WG4064> every<WG3956> wind<WG417> of doctrine<WG1319>, by<WG1722> the sleight<WG2940> of men<WG444>, and cunning craftiness<WG1722><WG3834>, whereby<WG4314> they lie in wait<WG3180> to deceive<WG4106>;
But<WG1161> speaking the truth<WG226> in<WG1722> love<WG26>, may grow up<WG837> into<WG1519> him<WG846> in all things<WG3956>, which<WG3739> is<WG2076> the head<WG2776>, even Christ<WG5547>:

From<WG1537> whom<WG3739> the whole<WG3956> body<WG4983> fitly joined together<WG4883> and<WG2532> compacted<WG4822> by<WG1223> that which every<WG3956> joint<WG860> supplieth<WG2024>, according<WG2596> to the effectual working<WG1753> in<WG1722> the measure<WG3358> of every<WG1538> part<WG1520><WG3313>, maketh<WG4160> increase<WG838> of the body<WG4983> unto<WG1519> the edifying<WG3619> of itself<WG1438> in<WG1722> love<WG26>.

This<WG5124> I say<WG3004> therefore<WG3767>, and<WG2532> testify<WG3143> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>, that ye<WG5209> henceforth<WG3371> walk<WG4043> not<WG3371> as<WG2531><WG2532> other<WG3062> Gentiles<WG1484> walk<WG4043>, in<WG1722> the vanity<WG3153> of their<WG846> mind<WG3563>,

Having the understanding<WG1271> darkened<WG4654>, being<WG5607> alienated<WG526> from the life<WG2222> of God<WG2316> through<WG1223> the ignorance<WG52> that is<WG5607> in<WG1722> them<WG846>, because<WG1223> of the blindness<WG4457> of their<WG846> heart<WG2588>:

Who<WG3748> being past feeling<WG524> have given<WG3860> themselves<WG1438> over<WG3860> unto lasciviousness<WG766>, to<WG1519> work<WG2039> all<WG3956> uncleanness<WG167> with<WG1722> greediness<WG4124>.
But<WG1161> ye<WG5210> have<WG3129> not<WG3756> so<WG3779> learned<WG3129> Christ<WG5547>;
If so be that<WG1489> ye have heard<WG191> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> have been taught<WG1321> by<WG1722> him<WG846>, as<WG2531> the truth<WG225> is<WG2076> in<WG1722> Jesus<WG2424>:

That ye<WG5209> put off<WG659> concerning<WG2596> the former<WG4387> conversation<WG391> the old<WG3820> man<WG444>, which<WG3588> is corrupt<WG5351> according<WG2596> to the deceitful<WG539> lusts<WG1939>;
And<WG1161> be renewed<WG365> in the spirit<WG4151> of your<WG5216> mind<WG3563>;
And<WG2532> that ye put on<WG1746> the new<WG2537> man<WG444>, which<WG3588> after<WG2596> God<WG2316> is created<WG2936> in<WG1722> righteousness<WG1343> and<WG2532> true<WG225> holiness<WG3742>.

Wherefore<WG1352> putting away<WG659> lying<WG5579>, speak<WG2980> every man<WG1538> truth<WG225> with<WG3326> his<WG846> neighbour<WG4139>: for<WG3754> we are<WG2070> members<WG3196> one of another<WG240>.
Be ye angry<WG3710>, and<WG2532> sin<WG264> not<WG3361>: let<WG1931> not<WG3361> the sun<WG2246> go down<WG1931> upon<WG1909> your<WG5216> wrath<WG3950>:
Neither<WG3383> give<WG1325> place<WG5117> to the devil<WG1228>.

Let<WG2813> him that stole<WG2813> steal<WG2813> no more<WG3371>: but<WG1161> rather<WG3123> let him labour<WG2872>, working<WG2038> with his hands<WG5495> the thing which is good<WG18>, that<WG2443> he may have<WG2192> to give<WG3330> to him that needeth<WG5532><WG2192>.

Let<WG4550> no<WG3361><WG3956> corrupt<WG4550> communication<WG3056> proceed<WG1607> out of<WG1537> your<WG5216> mouth<WG4750>, but<WG235> that which<WG1536> is good<WG18> to<WG4314> the use<WG5532> of edifying<WG3619>, that<WG2443> it may minister<WG1325> grace<WG5485> unto the hearers<WG191>.
And<WG2532> grieve<WG3076> not<WG3361> the holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151> of God<WG2316>, whereby<WG1722><WG3739> ye are sealed<WG4972> unto<WG1519> the day<WG2250> of redemption<WG629>.

Let<WG142> all<WG3956> bitterness<WG4088>, and<WG2532> wrath<WG2372>, and<WG2532> anger<WG3709>, and<WG2532> clamour<WG2906>, and<WG2532> evil speaking<WG988>, be put away<WG142> from<WG575> you<WG5216>, with<WG4862> all<WG3956> malice<WG2549>:

And<WG1161> be<WG1096> ye kind<WG5543> one to another<WG1519><WG240>, tenderhearted<WG2155>, forgiving<WG5483> one another<WG1438>, even as<WG2531><WG2532> God<WG2316> for<WG1722> Christ's<WG5547> sake<WG1722> hath forgiven<WG5483> you<WG5213>.
